short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to pick a crypto currency and a time interval, and the crypto currency price will refresh every time interval.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Crypto Track! This is a personal project of mine where I used the CryptoCompare API to create a small chrome extension that can display the prices of the crypto coins BIT, ETH, and JPY. Here are some things to know about using Crypto Track:

1. Clicking the Get Crypto Price button will refresh the price and make a new call to the API. If you'd like an instantaneous price check, use this! 
2. When using any of the time intervals, do not be worried if the price does not change right when the time interval hits. This could just mean that the price stayed the same!
3. I am hoping to add more functionality to this extension as time goes on, and if you have any suggestions, leave them in the reviews on this extension. 

Thank you!
Have a good one,
Aidan
